author: geirm
msg: Fixes a problem found on geir's Ubuntu 6 machine -
the netlink protocol has an undocumented misfeature
that a datagram read w/ insufficient buffer results
in a truncated message - the data is lost.
Fix simply dynamically allocates the buffer and
does a peek to see if the buffer is sufficient, and

author: toback
msg: Some small fixes to improve usability.

author: mturk
msg: Properly determine the minimum cache size.
